data.name: Clay Charge
data.desc: When an "Elemental HERO Clayman" you control is targeted for an attack (even if it is face-down, but reveal it to your opponent in that case): Destroy the attacking monster and that "Elemental HERO Clayman", and inflict 800 damage to your opponent.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
